title: What champ ?
body:
Hi , I want to buy a champion but I hesitate between kindred and ekko

I want fun and skill shoots, play jungle if possible

replies.body:
If you want Skill Shots, go with Ekko.

If you want Jungle, go with Kindred.

If you want fun, don't play LoL.

* Is Skillshot based
* Is Jungler

Pick ONE.
kindred. best jungle has a skill shot and is fun.
kindred doesn't have a skillshot. Her q is homing
oh, is it I thought it was a skill shot sorry.
